name: drupal/drupal_cms_starter
description: Applies the foundational Drupal CMS recipes.

suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_blog: Adds a blog post content type and listing page.
suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_case_study: Adds a case study content type and listing page.
suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_events: Adds an event content type and listing page.
suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_news: Adds a news content type and listing page.
suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_person: Adds a person profile content type.
suggest.drupal/drupal_cms_project: Adds a project content type and listing page.
